thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Reid S.

author: Reid S.
title: Reid S.
text: It took a little tweaking, but I now love my 10" Botanical Bliss mattress from PlushBeds. I am a side/back sleeper who prefers a rather firm mattress. I found the Medium upper layer to be WAY too soft and spongy. So I exchanged it for a Firm upper layer. To prevent any pressure points when sleeping on my side, I sourced a 2" pillow-top mattress cover from another company. Voila! Judy was very helpful in making sure that I'm happy with the product. Recommended!
